name: The Age of Politics
description:
Current Version 1.1.0, Release History, but the update is available only for windows so far. I will work to make it for linux and mac as well. This game is all about time progress and empire management. You are the manager of an empire in the year 0 and you are responsable with the army of the empire, its economy and foreign relations. Can you survive the test of time and rule it more than 3000 years? This game was made in Unity 3D using  MagicaVoxel, blender, Mixamo.com,gimp, Visual studio( the game is written in c#). This game will be frequently updated and if you want to help me grow this game into something great, please send me any issue, idea or something else. If you have any issue or idea, please contact me here: Twitter If you'd like to talk with me and this growing community, you can enter on this game's Discord Server: Discord Current features:
  • Commerce system( buy\sell goods and build mines);
  • four types of materials and their origin factories( farm and mines);
  • four types of troops( light,heavy,mounted and artillery);
  • two types of ecomonical goods( coins[ money ] and reputation);
  • five eras(ancient,medieval,modern,contemporary and future);
  • two slots of manual save and one for autosaving;
  • three types of events with three events each;
  • one winning condition;
  • barbarians attacks;
  • new 3D models;
  • independent country(Enemy Artificial Intelligences);
  • monthly trades;
  • era Updates;
  • new 3D models;
  • New improved and more user-friendly UI;
  • more manual saving slots;
  • Tutorial
Future plans:
  • More resourses;
  • Tradable resourses
  • Multiple languages support;
  • Multiple winning conditions;
  • More settings options;
  • and other crazy ideas, like the ones above.

The game will be updated, but not very often and please be patient, because the next summer, there will be some new great updates. It was a pleasure to make this game!
